sentences.sContent: We’ve had some dreadful weather lately.
sentences.sCn: 最近我们这里的天气糟透了。

sentences.sContent: Michelle felt absolutely dreadful (= very ill ) .
sentences.sCn: 米歇尔感觉病得很厉害。

sentences.sContent: ...The Internet has become a shield in many ways， exempting us from the consequence we should take responsibility for even though we make dreadful and malicious comments sometimes...

synos.tran: 可怕的；糟透的，令人不快的

trans.tranCn: 糟透了的， 极不合意的； 极端的， 极其大的； 可怕的
